knimeNode.name: Keras Network Executor
knimeNode.shortDescription: Executes a Keras deep learning network.

fullDescription.intro: This node executes a Keras deep learning network on a compatible external back end that can be selected by the user.

tab.name: General Settings
tab.option: The deep learning back end which is used to execute the input network for the given input data.
The number of rows that are processed at a time.

tab.name: Inputs
tab.option: The converter that is used to transform the selected input columns into a format that is accepted by the respective network input specification.
The table columns that are part of the respective network input. The availability of a column depends on the currently selected input converter.

tab.name: Outputs
tab.option: The converter that is used to transform the network output into table columns.
The prefix that is used to distinguish between the columns of the different outputs.
